Subject: New poll for nbwrpg 
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit


Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

Who here likes the 5 character limit!? 

  o I LOVE IT! It is making the RPG so much better! 
  o I think we should be able to have as many characters as we want to! 
  o I liked it better when it was a 16 character limit. 
  o I think we should at least be able to have 8 to 10... 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/surveys?id=951648  

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
